page.name: Understanding Rosary Beads
page.content:
Understanding Rosary Beads

Parts of the Rosary

  • Crucifix: Sign of the Cross and Apostles' Creed
  • First large bead: Our Father
  • Three small beads: Three Hail Marys
  • Centerpiece: Connects stem to main loop
  • Five decades: Each has 1 large bead (Our Father) + 10 small beads (Hail Marys)

No beads? You can count on your fingers, use an app, or pray along with a guided video!
